description: OVERNIGHT SKIN BOOSTER: Wake up to firmer, smoother skin! This adherent wrapping mask locks in skincare ingredients overnight, delivering 8 hours of intensive care to refine uneven skin tone, help improve skin firmness, and minimize the look of pores.99% HIGH-PURITY TXA+NIACINAMIDE: Experience APRILSKIN’s exclusive formula for toning care! Fast-absorbing high-purity TXA and Niacinamide work together to target uneven skin tone and improve radiance for a glowing complexion.MORNING SHED EFFECT: Nothing feels better than one clean shed every morning! Apply the mask before bed, let it work overnight, and gently peel off the mask to reveal smoother, clearer skin with a Korean glass glow.LOW IRRITATING FOR OVERNIGHT USE: Designed with a unique air-wrapping system to keep your skin comfortable and breathable all night without clogging your pores ! This lightweight mask locks in hydration while remaining gentle on the skin, offering maximum benefits while you sleep. *Clinically tested to be non-comedogenic by CUTIS Biomedical Research Center.CLINICALLY PROVEN RESULTS: Clinically proven to improve uneven skin tone by 2.6%, reduce the look of pores by 27%, enhance skin firmness by 3.5%, and boost skin radiance by 24.5% after one use. Clinically tested to be low-irritating for daily use. * Clinical Trial Tested by the 'Global Dermatological Research Institute.'/ Results may vary depending on individual skin types HOW TO USE: For a hands-free and even application, use the APRILSKIN Jelly Brush to apply the mask. *Please note that jelly brush is not included in this product
extra_description: OVERNIGHT SKIN BOOSTER: Wake up to firmer, smoother skin! This adherent wrapping mask locks in skincare ingredients overnight, delivering 8 hours of intensive care to refine uneven skin tone, help improve skin firmness, and minimize the look of pores.

HYDRATING, NOURISHING for FACIAL SKIN: The IUNIK water hydrating sleeping mask is formulated with non-irritating, alcohol free and natural ingredients, providing an all day long moisturization. The moisturizing formula with hyaluronic acids will be absorbed deeply through the layers of skin without clogging pores or greasy, sticky feeling. The facial mask does not need to be rinsed and will help to restore hydration and healthy skin.
60% INCREASE IN HYDRATION: MakePrem Organic serum is formulated with natural, non-irritating, non-alcohol and deeply hydrating ingredients. The 6 types of Hyaluronic acids in the formula provide all day and night long moisturization. The facial serum helps to restore hydration and healthy skin. The hydrating formula will be absorbed deeply through the layer of skin in seconds without clogging pores or heavy feeling. It is proven to increase moisture level by 60%.

description:
*The renewed version and the previous version of the product are being shipped randomly. Please rest assured that there is no difference in the contents, so you can use the product with complete confidence. Description


- Experience an overnight transformation with Medicube's Collagen Night Wrapping Mask, meticulously crafted to care for and protect your skin's elasticity while you sleep. This innovative peel-off facial mask is designed to work its magic overnight, providing intensive care for both elasticity and hydration.

- Featuring a collagen wrapping film, this mask offers 8 hours of triple care, ensuring elasticity, hydration, and a radiant glow throughout the night. Unlike other peel-off masks, this formulation effortlessly removes in one piece, leaving your face feeling refreshed and revitalized.

- Formulated with a potent fusion of key ingredients and advanced skincare technology, this Korean skincare gem can provide visibily firmer, smoother and more radiant-looking skin. Simply incorporate this easy-to-use mask into your nightly routine for visibily firmer and more radiant-looking skin.* Authenticity Check Check1 Medicube brand logo Check2 Product title in the middleCheck3 Full Direction & CautionCheck4 Made in Korea
How To Use

1. After cleansing, generously apply toner to cream on your clean face.
2. Complete your skincare routine by applying an even layer of the wrapping mask to your face. Use a brush or a spatula for smooth application, ensuring to avoid the eyebrows, hairline, eyes, and lips.
3. Let it dry for about 15 minutes, then go to sleep.
4. The next morning, gently remove the wrapping mask by peeling it from the edges or thoroughly rinse it off with lukewarm water to reveal refreshed skin.
Key Ingredients

Water, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Agave Americana Stem Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Glucose, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fructooligosaccharides, Fructose, Xanthan Gum, Cynanchum Atratum Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Althaea Rosea Flower Extract, Ceramide NP, Tocopherol, Pancratium Maritimum Extract, Collagen Extract, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate
extra_description: *The renewed version and the previous version of the product are being shipped randomly. Please rest assured that there is no difference in the contents, so you can use the product with complete confidence.

description:
Description

A sleeping mask formulated with 92% Snail Mucin and Azulene from chamomile calms the redness of sensitive skin and heals damaged skin while sleeping. It also can be used as a daily cream as a moisturizer.
How To Use
Apply on your last step of your skincare routine, before bedtime without washing off, and wake up with hydrated, calmed skin the next day.
TIP) For instant cooling, calming the redness from the irritated skin or sun exposure, it's better to use the one kept in refrigerated.

description:
Description

- A vegan cream that boosts skin's moisture barrier by 61% in 5 minutes.
- Contains 10% of provitamin B5, also known as Panthenol, which helps to enhance the skin moisture barrier.
- Contains TECA (Active Extract of Centella Asiatica) as a highly pure and effective ingredient known for its soothing and regenerating properties.
- The encapsulated high concentration of Panthenol effectively delivers its benefits to the skin, providing protection against external environmental factors and preventing moisture loss.

How To Use
1. Take an appropriate amount of cream.
2. Apply evenly to the face and gently pat until fully absorbed into the skin.

Key Ingredients
Water, Panthenol(10%), Methylpropanediol, Squalane, Glycerin, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Vinyl Dimethicone, Propylheptyl Caprylate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Betaine, Asiaticoside, Madecassic Acid, Madecassoside, Asiatic Acid, Centella Asiatica Extract, Centella Asiatica Root Extract, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Beta-Sitosterol, Taurine, Xylitol, Erythritol, Arginine, Phytosterols, Ceramide NP, Morus Alba Root Extract, Saccharomyces Ferment, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyglyceryl-2 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Stearyl Alcohol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Behenyl Alcohol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tromethamine, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Cholesterol, Sorbitan Isostearate, Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Sucrose Distearate

description:
Description

- A gel-type sleeping mask that contains Calendula Extract and Peptides to moisture and nourish skin during sleep.
- Contains 2200 ppm Calendula petals with 25 types of Peptides which provides anti-inflammatory benefits to help soothe damaged skin and revitalize skin.
- Enriched with Guaiazulene from Chamomile, Centella Asiatica extract, Panthenol, and Hyaluronic Acid to soothe, moisturize, and reduce redness.
- The watery gel texture spreads smoothly on skin and adheres to the skin while the active ingredients work overnight for you to wake up with plump and radiant skin.
- Vegan certified. All ingredients are of EWG green grade (excluding fragrance) with skin irritation test completed. Suitable for sensitive skin.
How To Use
Apply an even layer on skin before sleep and leave overnight. Rinse off and cleanse face to remove the remaining product the next morning.

Key Ingredients
Purified Water, Denatured Alcohol, Methylpropanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Betaine, Dipropylene Glycol, Gardenia Extract, Burdock Root Extract, Mud Mushroom Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Fig Extract, Kava Cover Leaf/Root/Stem Extract, Matricaria Extract, Feverfew Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Port Marigold Flower, Panthenol, Acrylate/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Glycerin, Tromethamine, Butylene Glycol Lycol, Polyglyceryl-10, Laurate, Dextrin, Sodium Phytate, Ceramide NP, Tocopherol, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Acetyl Octapeptide-3, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-2, Oligopeptide-6, Tripeptide-1, Copper Tripeptide-1, Hexapeptide-2, Dipeptide-2, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3, Acetyl Tripeptide-1, Hexapeptide-9, Tripeptide-2, Nonapeptide-1, Pentapeptide-3, Tripeptide -3, Alanine/Histidine/Lysine Polypeptide Copper HCL, Dipeptide-4, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-5, Palmitoyl Dipeptide-7, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tripeptide -5, Palmitoylpentapeptide-4, Dipeptide Diaminobutyroylbenzylamide Diacetate, Palmitoyltetrapeptide-7, Guaiazulene, Fragrance, Ethylhexylglycerin

description:
Description

Vegan Calendula Peptide Ageless Sleeping Mask 
Just One Night Use - Restored & replenished skin next day 
Contains 25 Peptides for Anti Aging 
The fresh green color is the natural color of guaiazulene, which penetrates into the skin to hydrate it and make the skin elastic.Retains the healthiness of natural ingredients, offering a simple yet effective skincare solution. Designed for busy individuals, this mask requires only a quick application before bedtime, allowing you to experience significant improvements in your skin's appearance by the next morning.This mask is enriched with carrot root extract and flower extract, which are packed with carotenoids, flavonoids, and lutein to brighten and deeply hydrate your skin.Contains Peptide 25s, which promotes collagen synthesis and delivers essential nutrients to the skin, providing effective anti-aging benefits.The aqua filling gel essence ensures long-lasting hydration, spreading smoothly and locking in moisture while you sleep.Made with a 100% vegan recipe and has completed animal testing and skin irritation tests, making it safe for even the most sensitive skin types. 
 
How To Use
At the last step of skin care in the evening, take an appropriate amount and apply on the face generously.
Gently rinse your face the next morning with lukewarm water.

product_name: *renewal* Full Fit Propolis Honey Overnight Mask 60ml
description:
Description

3-in-1 hydrating mask can be used as an overnight mask, a cream or as a wash off mask
Enriched with more than 87% of Propolis Extract and natural beeswax, this mask provides intensive hydration with refreshing moisture.

Suggested Use

1. As an overnight mask : Use in the end of the basic skin care routine before bed.
Apply a decent amount on the skin.

2. As a wash-off mask: Apply a generous amount of honey mask and leave it on for 15 minutes. 
Wash off with toner or tepid water. 

3. As a cream (in the morning): Use in the end of the basic skin care routine and proceed with your normal makeup step.

description:
Description

Formulated with our exclusive Forest Yeast extract, Cica Sleeping Mask is more effective than traditional Cica products.
Applied before bed, it makes the most of your shut eye by providing deep nourishment during the hours when skin is weakened due to loss of moisture and oil.

Suggested Use

1. After moisturizer, apply evenly to face as the last step in your nighttime routine.
2. Leave on overnight and rinse off in the morning.
3. Use 1 to 2 times per week.

Key Ingredients

WATER / AQUA / EAU, PROPANEDIOL, CETYL ETHYLHEXANOATE, SQUALANE, HYDROGENATED POLY(C6-14 OLEFIN), GLYCERIN, PANTHENOL, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER, GLYCERYL STEARATE CITRATE, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, POLYGLYCERYL-3 METHYLGLUCOSE DISTEARATE, POLYGLYCERYL-10 STEARATE, HYDROXYETHYL ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, GLYCERYL CAPRYLATE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, DISODIUM EDTA, ASIATICOSIDE, MADECASSIC ACID, SORBITAN ISOSTEARATE, ASIATIC ACID, MELALEUCA ALTERNIFOLIA (TEA TREE) LEAF OIL, AUREOBASIDIUM PULLULANS FERMENT, CHAMAECYPARIS OBTUSA LEAF EXTRACT, CYMBOPOGON MARTINI OIL, TOCOPHEROL

reviews.title: My holygrail
reviews.content:
This little jar is a skin savior, especially for sensitive or stressed skin! The Cica Sleeping Mask delivers intense hydration and soothing overnight care without feeling heavy or sticky. Even with the 10ml size, a small amount goes a long way.

I use it as the final step in my nighttime routine, and I always wake up with calm, plump, and refreshed skin. Redness and irritation noticeably decrease overnight, and my skin feels stronger and more resilient with regular use.

description:
Description

Refines texture + brightens + creates a uniform complexion + nourishes. Rice extract is a well-known natural ingredient in Asia for toning and softening the skin. Formulated with rice extract and niacinamide, this overnight mask leaves dull, flaky skin baby smooth and brigthened overnight. 
1. High moisturization - soft and silky skin 2. Brightening - Creates a complexion as lovely and smooth as milk3. High nourishment - for elastic, mochi-like skin. Once the moisturizer glides on the skin, it instantly feels soft and replenished with moisture without feeling greasy or heavy. Contains Fiber / Vitamin B2 / Vitamin B1 / Vitamin B6 / Linolenic acid/ Mineral
Suggested Use
1. As a sleeping mask – use at the end of your basic skin care routine, before bed. Apply a decent amount on the skin. Sweet dreams! Be prepared for a big surprise tomorrow! 2. As a wash-off mask – apply a generous amount and leave on for 15 minutes. Wash with toner or warm water. 3. As a cream – use at the end of your basic skin care routine and continue with your normal makeup steps.
Active Ingredients
Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Betaine, Niacinamide, Dimethicone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Elaeis Guineensis(Palm) oil, Elaeis Guineensis(Palm) Kernel Oil, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Arginine,Carbomer, Allantoin, Xanthan Gum

description:
Description
Intensive moisturizing sleeping mask makes skin clear,glowing,and revitalized in the morning,as if skin had a restful sleep,with the Sleep Tox fundtion of Laneige sleeping Mask.​ 
1.As Laneige's unique technology,the Moisture-Wrap technology increases skin's own absorption and sustaining capabilities while you sleep with its effective ingredients of hydro ion mineral water contained in the biopolymer mineral network,evening primrose extract,and apricot extract. 
2.The water Sleeping Mask is exclusive for overnight skincare to optimize the condition of skin the following morning,as if skin had a good night sleep. 
3.Skin loses a lot of moisture overnight if no skincare product is applied to it at night.The Sleeping Mask is a moisturizing Sleeping Mask that charges skin with the Moisture needed overnight. 
4.The anti-oxidant function of apricot extract porvides a brightening effect and makes skin look clear and bright by removing the free radicals that give stress to skin.
5.The Various effective Sleeping Care ingredients absorbed into skin overnight help skin absorb makeup the following morning.
​6.The light gel-type Mask helps skin have a good rest and provides a refreshing,moisturizing feel to skin without leaving any sticky residue.
​7.Every night before going to bed,apply lightly on skin and leave it on overnight without washing it off. You can experience softer skin texture after washing your face the following morning. 
​8.Natural flavors are extracted from natural resources and it occurs color Variation from its origin and harvesting time. Colors may be different, however,flavor and function are same. ​

Suggest Use
In the evening,apply on face after skin refiner and emulsion are applied to skin.​​
Active Ingredients
water, butylene glycol, cyclopentasiloxane, glycerin,cyclohexasiloxane, trehalose, sodium hyaluronate, oenothera biennis (evening primrose) root extract, prunus armeniaca (apricot) fruit extract, beta-glucan, chenopodium quinoa seed extract, ascorbyl glucoside, magnesium sulfate, zinc sulfate, manganese sulfate, calcium chloride, potassium alginate, ammonium acryloyldimethyltaurate/vp copolymer, polysorbate 20, dimethicone, dimethiconol, dimethicone/vinyl dimethicone crosspolymer, propanediol, ethylhexylglycerin, stearyl behenate, polyglyceryl-3 methylglucose distearate, hydroxypropyl bispalmitamide mea, inulin lauryl carbamate, alcohol, 1,2-hexanediol, caprylyl glycol, carbomer, tromethamine, disodium edta, phenoxyethanol, fragrance, blue 1 (ci 42090)
